name: Soctics: Pocket Football
description:
Football on the go!
* Play in historic tournaments and re-write history if you can!
* Play against your friends on the same device
* Watch online games from the multiplayer version

Soctics is a turn-based football game where your cunning strategies help you win your matches. Play against your device or your friends.

Use binoculars to predict the movement of the ball. Use them to plan surprising attacks!

Plays great on a toilet break! ;)
Binoculars for better attack control
Play against the device
Two players on the same device
SmartCrowd: your fans will support you during the games
Spectate online matches: see how the pros play
